name: Pruzansky Plumbing
description: A family-owned company based in Passaic, NJ, with over 100 years of experience. They provide residential and commercial plumbing services, including emergency repairs, sewer services, and boiler installations.

name: Budget Rooter Plumbing & Drain Cleaning
description: Family-owned and operated since 1992, serving Central New Jersey with a full range of plumbing and drain cleaning services, including 24/7 emergency response.

name: Pro-Tek Plumbing & Drain
description: Based in North Brunswick, NJ, they offer residential and commercial plumbing services, including repairs, water heaters, and drain cleaning, with a focus on upfront pricing.

name: All A's Plumbing & Heating
description: Serving Randolph, NJ, and surrounding areas, this family-owned company provides comprehensive plumbing, heating, and drain cleaning services, emphasizing quality workmanship and customer service.

name: Jersey Drains
description: A family-owned business specializing in drain cleaning, sewer line repair, and general plumbing services for both residential and commercial clients in Northern New Jersey, offering 24/7 availability.
